content: you may sell items made from my pattern but please reference my name and etsy shop yarnutopia please do not copy and post this pattern and claim it as your own materials -red heart super saver yarn 2 skeins 728 yards color charcoal -size j-6 00mm crochet hook -yarn needle -scissors notes chain chain st s stitch es slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet blo work in the back loop only
